revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC1900 Touch Screen Wi-Fi Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=2872&model=Touch+P5 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Touch P5 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7P5 |icid = 8853A-P5 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = yes,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = touchscreen |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/01/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00Y86CMA8 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5 or 6, Frequency band(s) of this radio --> |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 4.3" Touchscreen Display ([[STMicroelectronics]] chipset)
[[TP-LINK Touch P5]] <small> * AC1900 Speed – Stream 4K HD video and game online over dual 2.4/5GHz bands * Maximizes Wi-Fi range with 3x external antennas with high-powered ampli­fiers * Touchscreen Display – Effortlessly set up and manage your network settings * 1GHz Dual-Core Processor – Handles multiple tasks at once without interruption * Beamforming – Focuses Wi-Fi towards devices to form stronger connections * Multi-Purpose Design – Serves as a router, repeater, or access point </small>
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Touch-P5.html#specifications Specifications]
===Reviews=== *[http://homenetworkadmin.com/tp-link-touch-p5-review/ On '''HomeNetworkAdmin'''] *[http://itreviewer.ru/news/27102/mwc-2015-tp-link-pokazal-marshrutizator-touch-p5-s-sensornym-ekranom/ On '''ITReviewer'''] *[http://www.it-world.ru/news/devices/70248.html On '''IT-World'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/tplink/touch-p5/ On '''Openitforum''']
==See also== *[[TP-LINK TGR1900 (Google OnHub)|TP-LINK TGR1900]] - ''AC1900 Google OnHub Wireless Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7TGR1900 TE7TGR1900] (08/12/2015) *[[TP-LINK Touch P5]] - ''AC1900 Touch Screen Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7P5 TE7P5] (10/29/2015) *[[TP-LINK RE590T]] - ''AC1900 Touch Screen Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE590T TE7RE590T] (11/08/2015) [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B018017S8W Amazon] :[[Broadcom]] CPU, WLAN: 3T3R 1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz) *[[TP-LINK RE580D]] - ''AC1900 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE580D TE7RE580D] (11/26/2015) [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B010S6RYUY Amazon] *[[TP-LINK RE450]] - ''AC1750 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE450 TE7RE450] (12/30/2015) [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B010S6SG3S Amazon] *[[TP-LINK RE380D]] - ''AC1200 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE380D TE7RE380D] (11/30/2015) *[[TP-LINK RE355]] - ''AC1200 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE355 TE7RE355] (01/18/2016) [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B016K07YT8 Amazon] *[[TP-LINK RE350K]] - ''AC1200 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE350K TE7RE350K] (12/21/2015) *[[TP-LINK TRE210]] - ''AC750 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE210 TE7RE210] (08/24/2015) *[[TP-LINK RE200]] - ''AC750 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7RE200 TE7RE200] (08/21/2015) [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00NR2VMNC Amazon] *[[TP-LINK AP500]] - ''AC1900 Wireless Gigabit Access Point'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7AP500 TE7AP500] (11/25/2015) *[[TP-LINK AP300]] - ''AC1200 Wireless Gigabit Access Point'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7AP300 TE7AP300] (12/01/2015)
